name: Chicken Flip 2
description:
How to play

Try to land on the ramp at about a 90 degree angle. (The skateboard should be facing the ramp or slightly towards the ground.)

Normal Mode:

A and D or Left and Right arrow keys to flip the chicken.

The more flips the chicken does in the air, the higher it will fly.

Try to get as many flips in the air as you can!

(Your current combo will only be counted if the chicken lands safely on the ramp)

Do "Sum" Flips Mode:

A and D or Left and Right arrow keys to flip the chicken.

Flipping in the air does not effect the chicken's altitude.

Get as many total cumulative flips as you can!

(Flips are only added to your score when the chicken lands safely on the ramp)

Credits

Song Titles: Waddoop - Pep! - Peppy , Waddoop - Pep! - Peps Too (Looped)
